alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 1:11PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ottawa County through 145 PM CDT... At 111 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Narcissa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Baxter Springs... Commerce... Quapaw... Wyandotte... Narcissa... Ottawa... Peoria... Twin Bridges State Park... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 300 and 324. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
